title: Shanhai Zhurong
description:
Description :
        While performing a task assigned by the Academy of Sciences, the Blade Team broke into the enemy bunker. The protagonist Xia Yan accidentally discovered the ancient Donghuang Bell. By mistake, Xia Yan activated the power of the Donghuang Bell. Portal. The entire special team was sent to the unknown planet Shanhaixing, a world full of dangers and rampant monsters. Their survival challenge in this dangerous land is about to begin, and an adventure full of hope and courage is about to begin.

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 1: The Fortress Of The Gobi
